definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]

sentences.english: You may bring up to two liters of alcohol and two cartons of cigarettes to the Caribbean islands.
sentences.chinese: 您可能會帶來兩個公升酒精和兩箱香菸給加勒比島嶼。

sentences.english: Give me a big bag and a two-liter of diet Sprite.
sentences.chinese: 給我一包大包的和一瓶兩公升的低糖“雪碧”汽水。

sentences.english: They can also carry two 480 litre or 720 litre drop tanks.
sentences.chinese: 它們也能攜帶二副480公升或720公升副油箱。

sentences.english: They can also carry two 480 litre or 720 litre drop tanks.
sentences.chinese: 它們也能攜帶二副480公升或720公升副油箱。

sentences.english: It takes just one large fruit to make 6 liters of sharbat.
sentences.chinese: 一個大的貝耳可做6公升的“沙巴特”。

sentences.english: If you are using a concentrate, top up with filtered water to 23 liters.
sentences.chinese: 如果您使用集中，用被過濾的水加滿對23公升。

sentences.english: International spirits, by comparison, sold a meagre 80m litres in China.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，洋酒在中國的銷量僅爲8000萬公升。

sentences.english: The guide disguised his guilty of mixing the liquor width a liter of liquid.
sentences.chinese: 遊把酒與一公升液體混合的罪過掩飾起來。

sentences.english: The system can desalinate up to 600 liters of brackish water a day.
sentences.chinese: 這個系統一天可以將高於600公升的鹽水去鹽。

sentences.english: Mongols can drink up to ten liters a day.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古人一天最多可以喝10公升。

sentences.english: Couch stopped when he was down to 3.7 liters of water.
sentences.chinese: 考區用完了三點七公升的水，就停止旅程。

sentences.english: The side pockets are sized to hold one-liter water bottles.
sentences.chinese: 側面口袋鉅細進行一公升水的瓶子。

sentences.english: That's because just one cow can produce up to 500 liters of methane gas a day.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲只有一個牛可製造500公升的甲烷。

sentences.english: We fill these 3-liter-jars with berries, like this.
sentences.chinese: 象這樣把漿果裝進三公升的瓶子。

sentences.english: Each day the heart pumps about eight thousand liters of blood.
sentences.chinese: 每天心臟輸送約八千公升的血液。

sentences.english: Per litre in case of open-beck method.
sentences.chinese: 每公升在案件公開骨節方法。

definition: variant of 升[sheng1]/to ascend/to rise in rank
Chinese unit of weight equal to 0.5 kg
peso (currency in Latin America) (loanword)/also written 比索[bi3 suo3]
Nissan, Japanese car make/also transliterated 尼桑
